description: The KSK commando force has been criticised for right-wing extremism in its ranks.
title: Germany far right: Elite KSK commando force 'to be partially disbanded'
title_page: Germany far right: Elite KSK commando force 'to be partially disbanded' - BBC News
maintext: The unit was founded in 1996, and has some 1,000 soldiers trained for crisis situations such as freeing hostages abroad, which had not been possible until then without assistance from other countries' forces.
